Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Moon Palace Cancún - All Inclusive in Cancun, you'll be on the beach and convenient to Cancun Country Club. This 4.5-star resort is within the region of Wet n' Wild Cancun and Parish of the Risen Christ.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 2058 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and free minibar items. Rooms have private balconies or patios. 42-inch flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature jetted bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. After practicing your swing on the golf course, you can dip into one of the 10 outdoor swimming pools. Additional features at this resort include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
This resort is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 14 restaurants and 3 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. When you are in need of a refreshing drink, visit a swim-up bar or one of 9 bars/lounges, or 5 poolside bars.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this resort consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
This resort is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 14 restaurants and 3 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. When you are in need of a refreshing drink, visit a swim-up bar or one of 9 bars/lounges, or 5 poolside bars.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. After practicing your swing on the golf course, you can dip into one of the 10 outdoor swimming pools. Additional features at this resort include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).
Make yourself at home in one of the 2058 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and free minibar items. Rooms have private balconies or patios. 42-inch flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature jetted bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

When you stay at Moon Palace Cancún - All Inclusive in Cancun, you'll be on the beach and convenient to Cancun Country Club. This 4.5-star resort is within the region of Wet n' Wild Cancun and Parish of the Risen Christ.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cancun Country Club - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Wet n' Wild Cancun - 6 km / 3.8 mi
Parish of the Risen Christ - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
El Rey Ruins - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
Delfines Beach - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi
Crococun Zoo - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi
Maya Cancun Museum - 12.8 km / 7.9 mi
Aquaworld - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi
Ballenas Beach - 14.6 km / 9.1 mi
Ojo de Agua Beach - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi
Luxury Avenue Shopping Mall - 15.7 km / 9.8 mi
Puerto Morelos Town Square - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi
Puerto Morelos Reef - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi
San Jose Catholic Parish - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi
Kukulcan Plaza Shopping Mall - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi

The preferred airport for Moon Palace Cancún - All Inclusive is Cancun, Quintana Roo (CUN-Cancun Intl.) - 6 km / 3.7 mi.

The preferred airport for Moon Palace Golf & Spa Resort All Inclusive is Cancun, Quintana Roo (CUN-Cancun Intl.) - 7.5 km / 4.6 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Room 1

Notice
Guests staying in our main resort (Nizuc and Sunrise section) will have access to Ventura Park waterpark using their resort credit facility. ($89 per adult entrance including boat transportation) There is only one pick up at 9:20 hrs at Moon Palace Pier to Ventura Park. Departure pick up is 16:30 hrs at the park. Departures from Moon Palace Pier are available every day except on Sunday. Ventura Park is all inclusive as well. Non inclusive attractions are: arcade, go carts, lockers, towels, ice cream, drinks at arcade, premium drinks and rent of floating donut. If guests wish to take a taxi (at their own expense) then the price is $340 MXN (Mexican pesos) from 1 to 4 people. Van taxi price is $680 MXN ( Mexican pesos ) for up to 7 people.


Unlimited Golf package (UGP) includes unlimited rounds of golf, transportation to and from the Moon Spa Golf Club, unlimited food and beverages in the club house and inside of the golf course. All adults sharing the room must pay de supplement for their entire stay and it cannot be sold separately. Unused golf rounds due to weather conditions are non-refundable. No rain checks will be provided. UGP applies to guest paying the adult rate. Children 13-17 must be booked as adults to receive the UGP. Tee times can be reserved in advance at teetimes@palaceresorts.com, or by telephone (office hours 7 am - 8 pm Central) at +52 998 193-2010 ext 4444. Tee times are subject to space availability. Unlimited Golf package do not apply for Cozumel Isla Mujeres Palace and Moon Palace Jamaica. NOTE. Clients who opt for the unlimited golf instead of Resort Credit will be requested to pay a cart fee directly at the golf course: Moon Palace US $42.00. Riviera Golf Course: US $42.00.


RESORT CREDIT - THE LONGER YOU STAY MORE CREDITS YOU EARN: STAY 3 NIGHTS, GET USD $500 STAY 4 NIGHTS, GET USD $750 STAY 5-8 NIGHTS, GET USD $1500 STAY 9-11 NIGHTS, GET SD $2000 STAY 12 NIGHTS, GET USD $2500


Please note, effective from 01st January 2018 there is a 20.00 MXN Environmental Sanitation Fee per room, per that must be paid locally at the hotel during check-in.


Our Resort Credit programme is subject to change and to that effect, please be advised that wedding collections will no longer be available to purchase using Resort Credit


All used Resort Credit amount is subject to a 16% operational fee. Promotion does not apply to Famtrips, travel agent or employee rates, complimentary, incentive or compensatory stays. Not combinable with any other unused credit. Unused credit cannot be reimbursed in cash, is valid for up to 1 year from the check-out date, is transferable once to one guest, and does not apply towards spa treatments.


A new Indian restaurant will open this summer in the Sunrise section of Moon Palace Cancun , opening date TBA. The restaurant will be located close to Momo’s in the lobby area of Sunrise. Building works will all take place and that the noise and disruption will be kept to a minimum”


Customers are no longer able to use their resort credit to buy day passes to the Grand at Moon Palace. Customers are able to buy day passes locally at a reduced rate ( Palace Resorts guests Rate) $99.00 US adult $55.00 US 4-17years child rate (0- 3 years free) Which allows access from 7.00am until 11.00pm Customers resort credit can still be used for Spa Access and Treatments, Excursions, Romantics Dinners and Dolphin Swims.


Customers are no longer able to use their resort credit to buy day passes to the Grand at Moon Palace. Customers are able to buy day passes locally at a reduced rate (Palace Resorts guests Rate) $99.00 US adult $55.00 US 4-17years child rate (0- 3 years free) Which allows access from 7.00am until 11.00pm Customers resort credit can still be used for Spa Access and Treatments, Excursions, Romantics Dinners and Dolphin Swims.


Pony rides at Moon Palace Cancun is included in the Resort Credit programme. Available from Monday to Friday at 08:00am, 09:00am, 10:00am and 11:00am. Pony ride lasts for an hour. Available for children 4 to 10 years old. Cost is $79 in Resort Credit and 16% tax is payable as usual.


Customers are no longer able to use their resort credit for golf at the Grand Coral Golf Club.


Please note, effective from 01st January 2018 there is a 20.00 MXN Environmental Sanitation Fee per room, per that must be paid locally at the hotel during check-in.
